      • move

        public void move​(JoystickCoordinates coordinates)
        Indicates to DcMotor driver the specific power to get the expected movement. Also, calculates the arc-tangent to get its length and its angle. Useful when using joysticks.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - JoystickCoordinate
